name: Furosemide

ingredients.name: SODIUM STARCH GLYCOLATE TYPE A POTATO

warningsAndPrecautions: furosemide tables 40 mg supplied white off-white , round , flat face beveled edge , bisected compressed tablets , debossed `` ep `` bisect `` 117 `` bisect one side , `` 40 `` side ndc : 70518-0251-00 ndc : 70518-0251-01 ndc : 70518-0251-02 ndc : 70518-0251-03 ndc : 70518-0251-04 packaging : 30 1 bottle plastic packaging : 90 1 bottle plastic packaging : 100 1 bottle plastic packaging : 30 1 blister pack packaging : 180 1 bottle plastic note : dispense well-closed , light-resistant containers . exposure light might cause slight discoloration . discolored tablets dispensed . meets usp dissolution test 2 store 20° -25° c ( 68° -77° f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . protect light . repackaged distributed : remedy repack , inc. 625 kolter dr. suite # 4 indiana , pa 1-724-465-8762
adverseReactions: furosemide tablets contraindicated patients anuria patients history hypersensitivity furosemide .
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Furosemide tables 40 mg are supplied as white to off-white, round, flat face beveled edge, bisected compressed tablets, debossed "EP" above bisect and "117" below bisect on one side, and "40" on the other side in
                  NDC: 70518-0251-00
                  NDC: 70518-0251-01
                  NDC: 70518-0251-02
                  NDC: 70518-0251-03
                  NDC: 70518-0251-04
                  PACKAGING: 30 in 1 BOTTLE PLASTIC
                  PACKAGING: 90 in 1 BOTTLE PLASTIC
                  PACKAGING: 100 in 1 BOTTLE PLASTIC
                  PACKAGING: 30 in 1 BLISTER PACK
                  PACKAGING: 180 in 1 BOTTLE PLASTIC
                  
                  Note: Dispense in well-closed, light-resistant containers. Exposure to light might cause a slight discoloration. Discolored tablets should not be dispensed.
                  Meets USP Dissolution Test 2
                  Store at 20° -25° C (68° -77° F) [ See USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  Protect from light.
                  
                  Repackaged and Distributed By:
                  Remedy Repack, Inc.
                  625 Kolter Dr. Suite #4 Indiana, PA 1-724-465-8762
adverseReactions_original: Furosemide tablets are contraindicated in patients with anuria and in patients with a history of hypersensitivity to furosemide.
